alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Perry; Stone (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 10:17AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Mobile, southern Washington, George, southeastern Perry, southern Greene and Stone Counties through 1100 AM CDT... At 1016 AM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles west of Leakesville to 9 miles west of Lucedale to 3 miles southwest of Perkinston. Movement was northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wiggins, Citronelle, Lucedale, Leakesville, Perkinston, McHenry, Deer Park and McLain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi.
